```{r}
#| output: asis
x = list.files(pattern='html$', recursive=TRUE)
xnames = basename(x)
x <- x[xnames!='index.html']
xnames <- xnames[xnames!='index.html'] |> gsub('.html', '', x=_, fixed=TRUE)
for (i in seq_along(x)){
    cat(paste0('<p><a href="', x[i], '" target="_blank">', xnames[i],'</a></p>'))
} 
```
